channel.title: [508] Dark bow special won't work?

item.title: [508] Dark bow special won't work?
item.dc:creator: @skittle385 skittle385
item.description:
@skittle385 wrote:

Okay well this is the code I put in NPCPlayerCombat.java and PlayerCombat.java(its the same code copied in each):

else if (p.equipment[3] == 11235 && p.specialAmount >= 50) { // Dark bow. -- Made by Skittle385 if (Misc.getDistance(p2.absX, p2.absY, p.absX, p.absY) <= 8) { p.requestGFX(1111, 100); p.requestAnim(426, 0); p.frames.createGlobalProjectile(p.absX, p.absY, offsetY, offsetX, 249, 50, 25, 94, p.attackPlayer + 1); p2.appendHit(Misc.random(maxMeleeHit(p)), 0); p.specialAmount -= 50; hitDamage = Misc.random((int)(maxMeleeHit(p) * 1.50)); } }

But when I go to do the special, when it attacks the special bar get dehighlited and doesnâ€™t do the special?
